title: Shan Hai Zhuan
description: 山海傳, at 中山區樂群二路198號, is named after Chinese mythology The Class of Mountains and Seas character and is decorated accordingly to this theme. Its main offering is Taiwanese style shabu-shabu. A moving train brings out dishes and dishes of fresh vegetables and tofu that you cooked in a simmering pot of broth in front of you. For broth you have 10 different choices. Also offers fried rice and pizza made by an expat chef. Free Wi-Fi access. Staff speak English.
